message:
Add notebook-style ruled lines and 3D state cube with quaternion rotation

Features:
- Notebook ruled lines with subtle horizontal lines and left margin
- 3D state cube component with 6 faces (9 states per face)
- Quaternion-based rotation (no gimbal lock)
- Smooth trackball-style drag interaction
- Auto-snap to nearest face with slerp animation
- Progressive unlock system (currently 1 face unlocked)
